text: Christopher Andrew "Chris" Coons (born September 9, 1963) is the senior United States Senator from Delaware and a member of the Democratic Party. Coons won a special election in 2010 to succeed Ted Kaufman, who had been appointed to the seat when Joe Biden resigned to become the vice president of the United States. ==Other websites== *Senator Chris Coons official U.S. Senate site *Chris Coons for Senate * ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:United States senators from Delaware Category:Businesspeople from Connecticut Category:Businesspeople from Delaware Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Chris Coons
